title: All Campaigns: At the top of the page, you are logged in as the correct user you logged in as.
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then the user you logged in with should be reflected at the top right

title: All Campaigns: Verify the proper fields are present
custom_preconds: Given you are on logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected:
Then the following fields are present:

Campaign Name
Type
Shortcode
Status
Modified
Last Run
Action

title: All Campaigns: Verify all fields except 'Action' can be sorted in ascending and decending order
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And tap on any of the fields except 'Action'
custom_expected: Then the field selected will be sorted in ascending and descending order

title: All Campaigns: Verify that you can only see content if you are logged in.
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then you will see only the content that user is allowed to see

title: All Campaigns: Verify that running campaigns are shown in the correct color
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected:
Then active campaigns are shown with green text
And all other campaigns will be shown with black text

title: All Campaigns: Default is campaigns are sorted by status, with running appearing first.
custom_preconds:
Given you are in the campaign manager with valid credentials
And there are campaigns
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then the campaigns are listed by status with active sorted to the top

title: All Campaigns: Navigation through pages can be done through the '<< Previous' and 'Next >>' buttons
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there are enough campaigns to span multiple pages
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And tap the arrows to see the next pager of campaigns
custom_expected: Then the next page of campaigns will load

title: All Campaigns: Default expired campaigns are hidden
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there are default campaigns
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected:
Then you expired campaigns are hidden
And the expired campaign link will say 'Show Expired'

title: All Campaigns: Showing expired campaigns
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is an expired campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And tap 'Show Expired'
custom_expected:
Then the expired campaigns will be shown
And the expired campaigns link will become 'hide expired'
And if that link is tapped will hide expired campaigns

title: All Campaigns: User is able to logout
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And tap on 'Logout' in the top right next your username
custom_expected:
Then you will be logged out
And brought back to the log in page

title: All Campaigns: Action buttons correct color
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there are running, created, and stopped campaigns
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected:
Then you will see under the action field running buttons that are green
And stopped buttons that are red
And created buttons that are grey

title: All Campaigns: 'New Campaign' button should be on the main page
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then you will see in the top right a big blue button 'New Campaign'

title: Information Matching: The same keyword cannot be used more than once for the same shortcode across all campaigns
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there are campaigns
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then the same keyword cannot be used with more than one shortcode

title: Information Matching: Verify the campaign name matches the campaign itself as well as the main campaign page.
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a campaigns
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And tap on a campaign
custom_expected: Then verify the campaign name matches the campaign itself as well as the main campaign page

title: Information Matching: Verify the type on the main page matches the type of the campaign on that campaign page.
custom_preconds:
Given you are campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a campaign
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then the type on the main page matches the type of the campaign on that campaign page

title: Information Matching: Verify the shortcode on the main campaign page matches the shortcode on the specific campaign page.
custom_preconds:
Given you are campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a campaign
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then the shortcode on the main campaign page matches the shortcode on the specific campaign page

title: Information Matching: Verify the status on the main campaign page matches the status on the specific campaign page.
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials 
And there is a campaign
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then the status on the main campaign page matches the status on the specific campaign page

title: Information Matching: Verify the modified date on the campaign main pages matches the modified date on the specific campaign page.
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a campaign
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then the modified date on the campaign main pages matches the modified date on the specific campaign page

title: Information Matching: Verify the last run date on the main campaign page matches the last run date on the specific campaign page.
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a campaign
custom_steps: When you log into campaign manager
custom_expected: Then the last run date on the main campaign page matches the last run date on the specific campaign page

title: Campaign Messages: There should be a 'campaign messages' section on all campaigns
custom_preconds:
Give you are in campaign manager
And there are campaigns
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on a campaign name of any campaign
custom_expected: Then there should be a 'campaign messages' section on all campaigns

title: Campaign Messages: All campaigns should have the proper fields
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there are active campaigns
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on a campaign name of any campaign
custom_expected:
Then all campaigns should have the following fields:

Confirmation MT message
Winner MT message
Consolation MT message
Max Text2Win Exceeded MT message
Error MT message
Help MT message

title: Campaign Summary: Every campaign has a section 'Campaign Run Summary'
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is a campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on a campaign name of any campaign
custom_expected: Then every campaign has a section 'Campaign Run Summary'

title: Campaign Summary: If the campaign has not yet been run, the text reads 'No Runs for this Campaign'
custom_preconds:
Given you in campaign manager
And there is a non-active campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And look at a non-active campaign
custom_expected: Then the text reads 'No Runs for this Campaign'

title: Campaign Summary: If the campaign has been run, there will be 2 columns (start date, end date)
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is a campaign that has been run
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And go into a campaign that has been run
custom_expected: Then there will be 2 columns (start date, end date)

title: Campaign Summary: All runs will be in decending order
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there are campaigns
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on campaign name of any campaign
custom_expected: Then you will see all runs will be in descending order

title: Campaign Summary: Seeing the campaign run summary of running campaign
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is a campaign that is running
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on campaign name of a running campaign
And under the 'Campaign Run Summary' section click 'View'
custom_expected: Then you will be redirected to the campaign run summary page of that campaign

title: Campaign Summary: Clicking [view] will bring you to 'Campaign Run Data' page
custom_preconds:
Given you are campaign manager
And there is a campaign
custom_steps:
When you go to campaign manager
And click on campaign name of any campaign
And click on [view] link
custom_expected: Then you will be brought to the 'Campaign Run Data' page

title: Cloning Campaign: Verify that on all campaigns the clone button is there.
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is a campaign
custom_steps:
When you are in campaign manager
And click on a campaign name of any campaign
custom_expected: Then all campaigns will clone button

title: Cloning Campaign: Cancel cloning
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is a campaign
custom_steps:
When you are in campaign manager
And click on a campaign name of any campaign
And click clone
And scroll down 
And click cancel
custom_expected: Then another campaign has not been created.

title: Cloning Campaign: Clone a campaign
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is a campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on campaign name
And click clone
And click ok
custom_expected: Then a new campaign will be created the same as the one cloned

title: Cloning Campaign: Clone an expired campaign
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is an expired campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on 'show expired'
And click on an expired campaign
And click the 'clone' button
And fill out the form with new campaign name, short name, and keyword
custom_expected: Then you will be brought to the campaign page of the new campaign

title: Expire Campaign: Active campaign cannot be expired
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is an active campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on the campaign name of an active campaign
And click on the 'Expire' button
custom_expected:
Then you will be brought to a page where there is an error:

"This campaign is currently running and cannot be expired."

title: Expire Campaign: Verify the expire confirmation page
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is an available non-active campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on a campaign name of an available non-active campaign
And click the 'Expire' button
custom_expected:
Then you will be brought to a page where it will inform you on what keywords will be freed up when you expire this campaign
And asking you to confirm expiring the campaign

Example:

"Expiring this campaign will let you use the keyword(s) "winner, comma" in a new campaign.
Are you sure you would like to expire the campaign "TestWinner"?"

title: Expire Campaign: Successfully expire a campaign
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is an available non-active campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on a campaign name of an available non-active campaign
And click the 'Expire' button
And click the 'Ok' button
custom_expected:
Then you will brought back to the campaign page
And the status of that campaign will be 'Expired'

title: Starting Campaign: Starting a campaign from the All campaigns page
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click either 'Created' or 'Stopped' button under the Action field
custom_expected: Then a pop-up will appear to start campaign or cancel the request

title: Starting Campaign: Attempting to start campaign then hitting cancel
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And tap either 'Stopped' or 'Created' button under Action field for a non-active campaign
And hit the cancel button
custom_expected: Then the user is brought back to the campaign page.

title: Starting Campaign: Verify that if cancel is clicked, the campaign has in fact not been started.
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And tap either 'Stopped' or 'Created' button under Action field for a non-active campaign
And click cancel
custom_expected: Then the campaign will not be started

title: Starting Campaign: Start a campaign from All Campaigns page
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And tap either 'Stopped' or 'Created' button under Action field for a non-active campaign
And click 'ok' on the confirmation page
And click 'Close' on the campaign has started page
custom_expected:
Then the selected campaign will start
And the 'Last Run' field will update

title: Starting Campaign: Start campaign from campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active available campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click a campaign name of a non-active available campaign
And under 'Start Campaign' click the 'Start' button
And click the blue 'Ok' button on the confirmation page
And click 'click here'
custom_expected:
Then you will be brought back to the campaign page
And the status of the campaign will be 'Running'

title: Starting Campaign: Expired campaigns can not be started from All Campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is an expired campaign
custom_steps:
When you are on the All Campaigns page
And tap either 'Stopped' or 'Created' button under Action field for a non-active expired campaign
custom_expected: Then you should not be able to start campaign

title: Scheduling Campaign: The schedule section is available for non-active campaigns
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active campaign
custom_steps:
When you are in campaign manager
And click the campaign name of a non-active available campaign
custom_expected:
Then you will see the section 'schedule the start/stop of this campaign'
And you will see a green schedule button

title: Scheduling Campaign: There is no schedule section on active campaigns
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is an active campaign
custom_steps:
When you logged into campaign manager
And click the campaign name of an active campaign
custom_expected: Then you will not see the scheduling section

title: Scheduling Campaign: Clicking the schedule button will open the 'Configure Auto Start and Stop Dates' page
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active available campaign
custom_steps:
When you are in campaign manager
And click the campaign name of a non-active campaign
And click on the schedule button
custom_expected: Then the 'Configure Auto Start and Stop Dates' page will open

title: Scheduling Campaign: Clicking on the calendar will open up a calendar to pick the date and time.
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active available campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on a non-active available campaign
And click on schedule
And click on the calender
custom_expected: Then the calendar will open up a calendar to pick the date and time

title: Scheduling Campaign: Should not be able to enter a time in the past as a start time
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active available campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on a non-active available campaign
And click on schedule
And click on the calender
And attempt to choose a start date in the past
custom_expected: Then you will not be able to

title: Scheduling Campaign: Leaving the start date blank
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active available campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on a non-active available campaign
And click on schedule
And click on the calender
And leave the start date blank
And click save
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a pop up with 'Start Date and End Date Cannot Be Blank'
And click 'Ok' will bring you back to the campaign page

title: Scheduling Campaign: Leaving the end date blank
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with valid credentials
And there is a non-active available campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on a non-active available campaign
And click on schedule
And click on the calender
And leave the end date blank
And click save
custom_expected: Then the user will see a pop up with 'start date and end date cannot be blank'

title: Stopping Campaign: A running quiz should show the 'stop the campaign' section
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is an active quiz campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click on the the campaign name of an active campaign
custom_expected:
Then you will see the 'stop the campaign' section
And see a red stop button

title: Stopping Campaign: A non-running quiz should not have the 'stop the campaign' section.
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is a non-active quiz campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And look at a non-active quiz campaign
custom_expected: Then their should not have the 'stop the campaign' section.

title: Stopping Campaign: Stopping campaign confirmation page
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is an active campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And click the 'Running' button under the action field for an active campaign
custom_expected: Then a pop-up message "Are you sure you would like to stop the campaign "<name>"?will appear

title: Stopping Campaign: Clicking cancel will return the user to the previous page
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is an active quiz campaign
custom_steps:
When you go to campaign manager
And click 'Running' on an active campaign
And click cancel
custom_expected: Then you will be returned to the page you were previously on

title: Stopping Campaign: Verify that the campaign is still running after cancel is clicked.
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is an active campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And you click 'Running' button in the action field for an active campaign
And you click cancel
custom_expected: Then verify that you the campaign is still running

title: Stopping Campaign: Stopping campaign confirmation page
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is an active campaign
custom_steps:
When you go into campaign manager
And you click 'Running' button in the action field for an active campaign
And click ok
custom_expected: Then the message "<campaign>" campaign has been stopped should appear

title: Stopping Campaign: Verify campaign is actually stopped via text
custom_preconds:
Given you are in campaign manager
And there is a campaign which has just been stopped
custom_steps: When you send a text to the short code of the recently stopped campaign
custom_expected: Then you should not get a response on the handset
